00012 int qsort_inters(const void *e1, const void *e2){
00013         int ord;
00014         float ordf;
00015         
00016         ord=((Interconnection *)e1)->GetSource()->GetIndex() - ((Interconnection *)e2)->GetSource()->GetIndex();
00017         if(!ord){
00018                 ordf=((Interconnection *)e1)->GetDelay() - ((Interconnection *)e2)->GetDelay();
00019                 if(ordf<0.0)
00020                         ord=-1;
00021                 else
00022                         if(ordf>0.0)
00023                                 ord=1;
00024         }
00025    
00026         return(ord);
00027 }
00028 
00029 void Network::FindOutConnections(){
00030         // Change the ordenation
00031         qsort(inters,ninters,sizeof(Interconnection),qsort_inters);
00032         if(ninters>0){
00033                 for (int ninter=0;ninter<ninters;ninter++){
00034                         inters[ninter].GetSource()->AddOutputConnection(inters+ninter);
00035                 }               
00036         }
00037 }
00038 
00039 void Network::SetWeightOrdination(){
00040         if (ninters>0){
00041                 for (int ninter=0; ninter<ninters;ninter++){
00042                         int index = inters[ninter].GetIndex();
00043                         this->wordination[index] = &(this->inters[ninter]);
00044                 }
00045         }       
00046 }
00047 
00048 void Network::FindInConnections(){
00049         if(ninters>0){
00050                 for (int ninter=0;ninter<ninters;ninter++){
00051                         inters[ninter].GetTarget()->AddInputConnection(inters+ninter);
00052                 }
00053         }
00054 }

00056 NeuronType * Network::LoadNetTypes(char *neutype) throw (EDLUTException){
00057         int ni;
00058         NeuronType * type;
00059         
00060         for(ni=0;ni<nneutypes && strcmp(neutypes[ni].GetId(),neutype);ni++);
00061    
00062         if(ni<nneutypes){
00063                 type=neutypes+ni;
00064         }else{
00065                 for(ni=0;ni<nneutypes && neutypes[ni].GetId()[0] != '\0';ni++);
00066                 
00067                 if(ni<nneutypes){
00068                         neutypes[ni].LoadNeuronType(neutype);
00069                         type=neutypes+ni;               
00070                 }else{
00071                         throw EDLUTException(13,44,20,0);
00072                 }
00073         }       
00074         return(type);
00075 }

00077 void Network::InitNetPredictions(EventQueue * Queue){
00078         int nneu;
00079         for(nneu=0;nneu<nneurons;nneu++)
00080                 (neurons+nneu)->InitNeuronPrediction(Queue);
00081 }

00083 Network::Network(const char * netfile, const char * wfile, EventQueue * Queue) throw (EDLUTException): inters(0), ninters(0), neutypes(0), nneutypes(0), neurons(0), nneurons(0), wchanges(0), nwchanges(0), wordination(0){
00084         this->LoadNet(netfile); 
00085         this->LoadWeights(wfile);
00086         this->LoadNeuronTypeTables();
00087         this->InitNetPredictions(Queue);        
00088 }

00090 Network::~Network(){
00091         if (inters!=0) delete [] inters;
00092         if (neutypes!=0) delete [] neutypes;
00093         if (neurons!=0) delete [] neurons;
00094         if (wchanges!=0) delete [] wchanges;
00095         if (wordination!=0) delete [] wordination;
00096 }

00098 Neuron * Network::GetNeuronAt(int index) const{
00099         return &(this->neurons[index]);

00103         return this->nneurons;

00106 void Network::LoadNet(const char *netfile) throw (EDLUTException){
00107         FILE *fh;
00108         long savedcurrentline;
00109         long Currentline;
00110         fh=fopen(netfile,"rt");
00111         if(fh){
00112                 Currentline=1L;
00113                 skip_comments(fh, Currentline);
00114                 if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&(this->nneutypes))==1){
00115                         this->neutypes=(NeuronType *) new NeuronType [this->nneutypes];
00116                         if(this->neutypes){
00117                                 int ni;
00118                                 for(ni=0;ni<this->nneutypes;ni++){
00119                                         this->neutypes[ni].ClearNeuronType();
00120                                 }
00121                 skip_comments(fh, Currentline);
00122                 if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&(this->nneurons))==1){
00123                         int tind,nind,nn,outn,monit;
00124                         NeuronType * type;
00125                         char ident[MAXIDSIZE+1];
00126                         this->neurons=(Neuron *) new Neuron [this->nneurons];
00127                         if(this->neurons){
00128                                 for(tind=0;tind<this->nneurons;tind+=nn){
00129                                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00130                                 if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&nn)==1 && fscanf(fh," %"MAXIDSIZEC"[^ ]%*[^ ]",ident)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%i",&outn)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%i",&monit)==1){
00131                                         if(tind+nn>this->nneurons){
00132                                                 throw EDLUTFileException(4,7,6,1,Currentline);
00133                                                 break;
00134                                         }
00135                         
00136                                         savedcurrentline=Currentline;
00137                                         type=LoadNetTypes(ident);
00138                                         Currentline=savedcurrentline;
00139                         
00140                                         for(nind=0;nind<nn;nind++){
00141                                                 neurons[nind+tind].InitNeuron(nind+tind, type,(bool) monit, (bool)outn);
00142                                         }
00143                                 }else{
00144                                         throw EDLUTFileException(4,8,7,1,Currentline);
00145                                         break;
00146                                 }
00147                         }
00148                         }else{
00149                                 throw EDLUTFileException(4,5,28,0,Currentline);
00150                         }
00151                 }else{
00152                         throw EDLUTFileException(4,9,8,1,Currentline);
00153                 }
00154                 
00155                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00156                         if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&(this->nwchanges))==1){
00157                                 float maxpos,a1pre,a2prepre;
00158                                 int trigger;
00159                                 int multiplicative;
00160                                 int wcind;
00161                                 this->wchanges=new WeightChange * [this->nwchanges];
00162                                 if(this->wchanges){
00163                                         for(wcind=0;wcind<this->nwchanges;wcind++){
00164                                                 int indexp;
00165                                                 static float explpar[]={30.1873,60.3172,5.9962};
00166                                                 static float expcpar[]={-5.2410,3.1015,2.2705};
00167                                                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00168                                                 if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&trigger)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%f",&maxpos)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%f",&a1pre)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%f",&a2prepre)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%i",&multiplicative)==1){
00169                                                         if(a1pre < -1.0 || a1pre > 1.0){
00170                                                                 throw EDLUTFileException(4,27,22,1,Currentline);
00171                                                                 break;
00172                                                         }
00173                                                         if (multiplicative==1){
00174                                                                 this->wchanges[wcind] = new MultiplicativeWeightChange();
00175                                                         }else{
00176                                                                 this->wchanges[wcind] = new AdditiveWeightChange();
00177                                                         }
00178                                                         this->wchanges[wcind]->SetTrigger(trigger);
00179                                         this->wchanges[wcind]->SetMaxPos(maxpos);
00180                                         this->wchanges[wcind]->SetNumExps(3);
00181                                         for(indexp=0;indexp<this->wchanges[wcind]->GetNumExps();indexp++){
00182                                                 this->wchanges[wcind]->SetLparAt(indexp,(maxpos == 0)?0:(0.1/maxpos)*explpar[indexp]);
00183                                                 this->wchanges[wcind]->SetCparAt(indexp,expcpar[indexp]);
00184                                         }
00185                                         
00186                                         this->wchanges[wcind]->SetA1Pre(a1pre);
00187                                         this->wchanges[wcind]->SetA2PrePre(a2prepre);
00188                                 }else{
00189                                         throw EDLUTFileException(4,28,23,1,Currentline);
00190                                         break;
00191                                 }
00192                                         }
00193                                 }else{
00194                                         throw EDLUTFileException(4,5,4,0,Currentline);
00195                                 }
00196                         }else{
00197                                 throw EDLUTFileException(4,26,21,1,Currentline);
00198                         }
00199                 
00200                 
00201                         skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00202                         if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&(this->ninters))==1){
00203                                 int source,nsources,target,ntargets,nreps,wchange;
00204                                 float delay,delayinc,maxweight;
00205                                 int type;
00206                                 int iind,sind,tind,rind,posc;
00207                                 this->inters=(Interconnection *) new Interconnection [this->ninters];
00208                                 this->wordination=(Interconnection **) new Interconnection * [this->ninters];
00209                                 if(this->inters && this->wordination){
00210                                         for(iind=0;iind<this->ninters;iind+=nsources*ntargets*nreps){
00211                                                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00212                                                 if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&source)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%i",&nsources)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%i",&target)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%i",&ntargets)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%i",&nreps)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%f",&delay)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%f",&delayinc)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%i",&type)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%f",&maxweight)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%i",&wchange)==1){
00213                                                         if(iind+nsources*ntargets*nreps>this->ninters){
00214                                                                 throw EDLUTFileException(4,10,9,1,Currentline);
00215                                                                 break;
00216                                                         }else{
00217                                                                 if(source+nreps*nsources>this->nneurons || target+nreps*ntargets>this->nneurons){
00218                                                                                 throw EDLUTFileException(4,11,10,1,Currentline);
00219                                                                                 break;
00220                                                                         }else{
00221                                                                                 if(wchange >= this->nwchanges){
00222                                                                                         throw EDLUTFileException(4,29,24,1,Currentline);
00223                                                                                         break;
00224                                                                                 }
00225                                                                 }
00226                                                         }
00227                                                         
00228                                                         for(rind=0;rind<nreps;rind++){
00229                                                                 for(sind=0;sind<nsources;sind++){
00230                                                                         for(tind=0;tind<ntargets;tind++){
00231                                                                                 posc=iind+rind*nsources*ntargets+sind*ntargets+tind;
00232                                                                                 this->inters[posc].SetIndex(posc);
00233                                                                                 this->inters[posc].SetSource(&(this->neurons[source+rind*nsources+sind]));
00234                                                                                 this->inters[posc].SetTarget(&(this->neurons[target+rind*ntargets+tind]));
00235                                                                                 //Net.inters[posc].target=target+rind*nsources+tind;  // other kind of neuron arrangement
00236                                                                                 this->inters[posc].SetDelay(delay+delayinc*tind);
00237                                                                                 this->inters[posc].SetType(type);
00238                                                                                 //this->inters[posc].nextincon=&(this->inters[posc]);       // temporaly used as weight index
00239                                                                                 this->inters[posc].SetWeight(maxweight);   //TODO: Use max interconnection conductance
00240                                                                                 this->inters[posc].SetMaxWeight(maxweight);
00241                                                                                 if(wchange >= 0){
00242                                                                                         this->inters[posc].ClearActivity();
00243                                                                                         this->inters[posc].SetWeightChange(this->wchanges[wchange]);
00244                                                                                 }
00245                                 
00246                                                         this->inters[posc].SetLastSpikeTime(0); // -1.0/0.0; // -Infinite not needed if last activity=0
00247                                                 }
00248                                                                 }
00249                                                         }
00250                                                 }else{
00251                                                         throw EDLUTFileException(4,12,11,1,Currentline);
00252                                                         break;
00253                                                 }
00254                                         }
00255                                         
00256                                         FindOutConnections();
00257                         SetWeightOrdination(); // must be before find_in_c() and after find_out_c()
00258                         FindInConnections();
00259                     }else{
00260                                         throw EDLUTFileException(4,5,28,0,Currentline);
00261                                 }
00262                         }else{
00263                                 throw EDLUTFileException(4,13,12,1,Currentline);
00264                         }
00265             }else{
00266                 throw EDLUTFileException(4,5,4,0,Currentline);
00267                         }
00268                 }else{
00269                         throw EDLUTFileException(4,6,5,1,Currentline);
00270                 }
00271                 
00272                 fclose(fh);
00273         }else{
00274                 throw EDLUTFileException(4,14,13,0,Currentline);
00275         }
00276         
00277         return;
00278 }
00279 
00280 void Network::LoadWeights(const char *wfile) throw (EDLUTFileException){
00281         FILE *fh;
00282         int connind;
00283         long Currentline;
00284         fh=fopen(wfile,"rt");
00285         if(fh){
00286                 int nweights,weind;
00287                 float weight;
00288                 Currentline=1L;
00289                 skip_comments(fh,Currentline);
00290                 for(connind=0;connind<this->ninters;connind+=nweights){
00291                         skip_comments(fh, Currentline);
00292                         if(fscanf(fh,"%i",&nweights)==1 && fscanf(fh,"%f",&weight)==1){
00293                                 if(nweights < 0 || nweights + connind > this->ninters){
00294                                         throw EDLUTFileException(11,32,26,1,Currentline);
00295                                         break;
00296                                 }
00297                                 
00298                                 if(nweights == 0){
00299                                         nweights=this->ninters-connind;
00300                                 }
00301                                 
00302                                 for(weind=0;weind<nweights;weind++){
00303                                         Interconnection * Connection = this->wordination[connind+weind];
00304                                         Connection->SetWeight(((weight < 0.0)?rand()*Connection->GetMaxWeight()/RAND_MAX:((weight > Connection->GetMaxWeight())?Connection->GetMaxWeight():weight)));
00305                                 }
00306                         }else{
00307                                 throw EDLUTFileException(11,31,25,1,Currentline);
00308                                 break;
00309                         }
00310                 }
00311                 fclose(fh);
00312         }else{
00313                 throw EDLUTFileException(11,30,13,0,Currentline);
00314         }
00315         
00316 }
00317 
00318 void Network::SaveWeights(const char *wfile) throw (EDLUTException){
00319         FILE *fh;
00320         int connind,ret;
00321         long Currentline;
00322         fh=fopen(wfile,"w");
00323         if(fh){
00324                 float weight,antweight;
00325                 int nantw;
00326                 Currentline=1L;
00327                 ret=0;
00328                 nantw=0;
00329                 antweight=0.0;
00330                 weight=0.0; // just to avoid compiler warning messages
00331                 
00332                 // Write the number of weights
00333                 if(fprintf(fh,"%li\n",this->ninters) <= 0){
00334                         throw EDLUTException(12,33,4,0);
00335                 }
00336                                         
00337                 for(connind=0;connind<=this->ninters;connind++){
00338                         if(connind < this->ninters){
00339                                 weight=this->wordination[connind]->GetWeight();
00340                         }
00341                         
00342                         if(antweight != weight || connind == this->ninters){
00343                                 if(nantw > 0){
00344                                         if(fprintf(fh,"%i %g\n",nantw,antweight) <= 0){
00345                                                 throw EDLUTException(12,33,4,0);
00346                                                 break;
00347                                         }
00348                                 }
00349                                 
00350                                 antweight=weight;
00351                                 nantw=1;
00352                         }else{
00353                                 nantw++;
00354                         }
00355                 }
00356                 
00357                 fprintf(fh,"// end of written data\n");
00358                 
00359                 fclose(fh);
00360         }else{
00361                 throw EDLUTException(12,30,27,0);
00362         }
00363         
00364 }

00366 void Network::LoadNeuronTypeTables() throw (EDLUTException){
00367         int ntype;
00368         for(ntype=0;ntype<this->nneutypes;ntype++){
00369                 this->neutypes[ntype].LoadTables();
00370         }
00371 }

00373 ostream & Network::GetNetInfo(ostream & out) const{
00374         int ind,ind2,wneu=0;
00375         out << "Neuron types:" << endl;
00376         for(ind=0;ind<this->nneutypes;ind++){
00377                 out << "- Type: " << ind << " state vars: " << this->neutypes[ind].GetStateVarsNumber() << " tables: " << this->neutypes[ind].GetTableNumber() << endl;
00378         }
00379    
00380         if(ind < this->nneutypes){
00381                 out << "..." << this->nneutypes-1 << endl;
00382         }
00383    
00384         out << "Neurons:" << endl;
00385         
00386         for(ind=0;ind<this->nneurons;ind++){
00387                 out << "- Neuron: " << ind << " typ: " << this->neurons[ind].GetNeuronType()->GetId() << " v0: " << this->neurons[ind].GetStateVarAt(1) << " v1: " << this->neurons[ind].GetStateVarAt(2) << " lastup: " << this->neurons[ind].GetLastUpdate() << " predsp: " << this->neurons[ind].GetPredictedSpike() << " " << this->neurons[ind].GetOutputNumber() << " " << (this->neurons[ind].IsMonitored()?"o":"") << endl;
00388                 wneu=0;
00389         for(ind2=0;ind2<this->ninters && this->inters[ind2].GetTarget() != this->neurons+ind && this->inters[ind2].GetSource() != this->neurons+ind ;ind2++);
00390                 if(ind2 == this->ninters)
00391                 wneu=1;
00392         }
00393    
00394         if(ind < this->nneurons){
00395                 out << "..." << this->nneurons-1 << endl;
00396         }
00397    
00398         if(wneu)
00399                 out << "Warning: There are neurons without connection" << endl;
00400 
00401         out << "Weight change types:" << endl;
00402         for(ind=0;ind<this->nwchanges;ind++){
00403                 out << "- Change: " << ind << " trigger: " << this->wchanges[ind]->GetTrigger() << " max pos: " << this->wchanges[ind]->GetMaxPos() << " alpha: " << this->wchanges[ind]->GetA1Pre() << " beta: " << this->wchanges[ind]->GetA2PrePre() << endl;
00404         }
00405 
00406         if(ind < this->nwchanges){
00407                 out << "..." << this->nwchanges-1 << endl;
00408         }
00409         
00410         out << "Interconnections:" << endl;
00411 
00412         for(ind=0;ind<this->ninters; ind++){
00413                 out << "- Interc: " << ind << " source: " << this->inters[ind].GetSource()->GetIndex() << " target: " << this->inters[ind].GetTarget()->GetIndex() << " delay: " << this->inters[ind].GetDelay() << " type: " << ((this->inters[ind].GetType()==1)?"E":((this->inters[ind].GetType()==0)?"I":"C")) << " weight: " << this->inters[ind].GetWeight() << endl;
00414         }
00415 
00416         if(ind < this->ninters){
00417                 out << "..." << this->ninters-1 << endl;
00418         }
00419         
00420         return out;
00421 }
